name: 宋兆祥
objective:
以專題研究方式訓練學生獨立企劃，分析，評斷，歸納及創新思考的能力。並藉由對視覺美學，媒體技術，媒體機能相關性等問題之深入探討，實際演練媒體設計之過程及熟練媒體設計之手法.
Studio in media design for the senior. Students are expected to exhibit a full range of professional competence and facility in designing advanced media and component complexes of broad scope. All phases of each project design are brought to a professional level under supervision of the director. This course puts emphasis on presentation techniques, including verbal, visual, and written. A project report is required.
